si.t: Input: Values specific to an individual PO (only the values from the first line will be used)
Input: Values specific to an individual line within a PO
Input: Values which apply to the entire PO
Receive on Purchase Order in batch
Create change orders against Purchase Orders in batch (e.g., move due dates)
Summarizes funding required by projects for POs which fail budget check
Automates the creation and management of Purchase Orders within PeopleSoft.
1. Google Chrome must be installed. Download the latest version from: http://www.google.com/chrome
Duplicates a set of rows by repeating each row a specified number of times.
Example Use: Repeat project codes for insertion into multi-line POs
Lists each individual PO from PO_Q and PO_FromQuotePO
POs are budget checked even when no PO number exists.
New Feature: PO_Receipt Q: Specify receive quantity
PO_Q: Quantity no longer has to be a whole number
- Press the ESC key to stop the tool.
- POs which have text in the PO_NUM field will be skipped (e.g., a PO number or <ERROR>).

r.t: POs which have text in the
PO_NUM
field will be skipped (e.g., a PO number or <ERROR>).

PO_NUM
field will be skipped (e.g., a PO number or <ERROR>).
POs which have text in the
Status
field will be skipped (e.g., SUCCESS or <ERROR>).
POs which have text in the
Result
field will be skipped (e.g., SUCCESS or <ERROR>).
- POs which have text in the
RECEIPT_ID
field will be skipped (e.g., a receipt number or <ERROR>).

si.t: - The automation tool will stop after 5 consecutive errors.
PS Upgrade Issue - Fixed error when searching for popup containers

PS Upgrade Issue - Internal PS JS procedure hAction_win0() is no longer valid. This has caused many issues including not allowing the creation of multi-line Pos, change orders, etcâ€¦ All active hAction_win0 calls have been replaced with their submitAction_win0() equivalents. Commented out lines still need to be updated if re-used
PS Upgrade Issue - Additional: PO ID extraction error when during saving with budget check
PS Upgrade Issues - Fixed issues when suppressing popup windows. This is has caused issues when creating change orders
3. Get the latest chromedriver. https://sites.google.com/a/chromium.org/chromedriver/downloads/ (copy driver file to ---- C:\Program Files (x86)\SeleniumWrapper ---- folder)
Added chromedriver upgrade instructions to README PO_Receipt_Q - Allows receiving of all lines/schedules. Using ALL keyword in first PO Line

r.t: Set the
Receive Qty
field to partially receive on a specific line. Leaving the field blank will tell the software to perform a full receive.
Set the
PO Line
field value to
ALL
to receive on all lines in the PO.
Each PO should have a unique
QUEUE_ID
. The
QUEUE_ID
should be repeated for each line in the same PO.

si.t: Budget Check Purchase Order in batch. Returns required project funding amounts

r.t: "Receipt line matching" error is returned when (1) there are more than one PO lines to receive on a single PO AND (2) after selecting the PO lines to receive, the PeopleSoft displays the PO lines out-of-order. The lines fail to match because of the out-of-order condition.
Workaround: Sort the PO Line in Ascending order manually (OK to do on a different PO). PeopleSoft remembers the settings for future PO receipts

si.t: PO_Q: When activity IDs are invalid, a list of valid activity IDs are returned in error message - Feature not working
PO_Receipt_Q - If a valid receipt ID is created, automatically ackowledges each popup regardless of the message. PO_Receipt_Q - Added USER_DATA field for cross-referencing results.

r.t: - Use the
USER_DATA
field to enter custom data for later cross-referencing. It is ignored by the tool.
Account for duplicate line #/schedule numbers entered in the spreadsheet (error message)
Workaround: Ensure each PO ID, PO Line, and Schedule is unique before running tool.

si.t: PO_ChangeOrder_Q: Allow due date /modifcations by line
Add option to adjust auto-adjust due dates if they fall on a holiday or weekend (prevents unexpected PS popup)
If there are any items other than "RO" types (such as an SO type) it tends to skip over the entire PO for receipt
Completing a PO with a $0 line results in an error
Quote Attachment File Path (Double-Click to Select)
Create Purchases Orders in batch from eQuotes (e.g., Nokia/Ericsson)

r.t: Each PO should have a unique
QUEUE_ID
. The
QUEUE_ID
should be repeated for each line modification.

si.t:
General Updates - Speed optimization/increase. All automation should now run faster. - Added ability to adjust the number of failures before quitting (default: 6)
Receiving (PO_Receipt_Q): Major overhaul of internal code. - Auto-acknowledges all popups after Receipt ID is generated. - Pre-Checks for duplicate PO Lines/Schedules - Fixed issue with out-of-order Receipt Line matching. - Continues receiving on all lines even if one line is unreceivable
PO Creation (PO_Q/PO_eQuote_Q): - Quote attachment feature added - Excess available prompt is acknowledged - Suppresses new minor prompts ($0 line items, due dates on holidays) - Save with budget check: increased timeout period to 5 minutes. - Returns valid activity IDs when invalid value is given - Expense PO issue fixed. Tool should now work with expense POs. - Added xPress Bid Field (PO_Q only) - Vendor can be set using either ID or SHORT NAME (PO_Q only) - Added Retry Save with Budget Check to PO_eQuote_Q
eQuotes which require line modifications (engineering/install lines) should include PO_LINE and the ITEM ID. Leave fields blank if not required.
